message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
Hi Alice,  $150 is a bit high for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $85 for it.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm thinking more along the lines of $130. What do you think?
Alice, $130 is still a bit too high for me. I'm happy to pay $95 for it, but I can't go any higher. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $112.50. What do you think?
Alice, $112.50 is still a little out of my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $100, but I really can't go any higher.  Let's try to make this work!
